summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York, informing a colleague that they have provided contact information to an attorney for a potential witness (referred to as 'IMI') who may reach out directly for an interview. The document is subject to a protective order.

persons.name: IMI
persons.context: A person whom the prosecution team is seeking to interview; her attorney has been contacted and may have her call the team directly.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Author of the email, working in the Southern District of New York, coordinating contact with a potential witness via her attorney.

connections.description: The AUSA is attempting to arrange an interview with IMI as part of an investigation.

events.title: Coordination for Witness Interview
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney follows up on requests to interview a potential witness (IMI) and provides contact information to her attorney.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The prosecution team in the Southern District of New York was actively seeking to interview a witness referred to as 'IMI' as of February 2020.
Contact was made through the witness's attorney, who requested a direct number for the prosecution team.
The document is explicitly marked as subject to a protective order covering specific paragraphs, indicating sensitive information.
